mapper.select: select arrival_id, employee_id, business_type, document, arrival_date, purchase_type, vendor, department, clerk_name, currency, exchange_rate, transportation_type, tax_rate, arrival_remark, invoice_number, arrival_creater, now_num, reviewer, arrival_state, create_date from accessories_arrival where arrival_id = #{arrivalId}
mapper.insert: insert into accessories_arrival(employee_id, business_type, document, arrival_date, purchase_type, vendor, department, clerk_name, currency, exchange_rate, transportation_type, tax_rate, arrival_remark, invoice_number, arrival_creater, now_num, reviewer, arrival_state, create_date) values (#{employeeId}, #{businessType}, #{document}, #{arrivalDate}, #{purchaseType}, #{vendor}, #{department}, #{clerkName}, #{currency}, #{exchangeRate}, #{transportationType}, #{taxRate}, #{arrivalRemark}, #{invoiceNumber}, #{arrivalCreater}, #{nowNum}, #{reviewer}, #{arrivalState}, #{createDate})

insert into accessories_arrival(employee_id, business_type, document, arrival_date, purchase_type, vendor, department, clerk_name, currency, exchange_rate, transportation_type, tax_rate, arrival_remark, invoice_number, arrival_creater, now_num, reviewer, arrival_state, create_date) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.businessType}, #{entity.document}, #{entity.arrivalDate}, #{entity.purchaseType}, #{entity.vendor}, #{entity.department}, #{entity.clerkName}, #{entity.currency}, #{entity.exchangeRate}, #{entity.transportationType}, #{entity.taxRate}, #{entity.arrivalRemark}, #{entity.invoiceNumber}, #{entity.arrivalCreater}, #{entity.nowNum}, #{entity.reviewer}, #{entity.arrivalState}, #{entity.createDate})

insert into accessories_arrival(employee_id, business_type, document, arrival_date, purchase_type, vendor, department, clerk_name, currency, exchange_rate, transportation_type, tax_rate, arrival_remark, invoice_number, arrival_creater, now_num, reviewer, arrival_state, create_date) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.businessType}, #{entity.document}, #{entity.arrivalDate}, #{entity.purchaseType}, #{entity.vendor}, #{entity.department}, #{entity.clerkName}, #{entity.currency}, #{entity.exchangeRate}, #{entity.transportationType}, #{entity.taxRate}, #{entity.arrivalRemark}, #{entity.invoiceNumber}, #{entity.arrivalCreater}, #{entity.nowNum}, #{entity.reviewer}, #{entity.arrivalState}, #{entity.createDate})
on duplicate key update employee_id = values(employee_id), business_type = values(business_type), document = values(document), arrival_date = values(arrival_date), purchase_type = values(purchase_type), vendor = values(vendor), department = values(department), clerk_name = values(clerk_name), currency = values(currency), exchange_rate = values(exchange_rate), transportation_type = values(transportation_type), tax_rate = values(tax_rate), arrival_remark = values(arrival_remark), invoice_number = values(invoice_number), arrival_creater = values(arrival_creater), now_num = values(now_num), reviewer = values(reviewer), arrival_state = values(arrival_state), create_date = values(create_date)
mapper.update:
update accessories_arrival
employee_id = #{employeeId},
business_type = #{businessType},
document = #{document},
arrival_date = #{arrivalDate},
purchase_type = #{purchaseType},
vendor = #{vendor},
department = #{department},
clerk_name = #{clerkName},
currency = #{currency},
exchange_rate = #{exchangeRate},
transportation_type = #{transportationType},
tax_rate = #{taxRate},
arrival_remark = #{arrivalRemark},
invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber},
arrival_creater = #{arrivalCreater},
now_num = #{nowNum},
reviewer = #{reviewer},
arrival_state = #{arrivalState},
create_date = #{createDate},
where arrival_id = #{arrivalId}
